name: Colosseum Brawl
description:
A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 31 - Entire Game on One Screen

Colosseum Brawl is a single-screen 2D fighter game where you must survive round after round of bloody fighting to curry the favour of the fickle crowd. Jump, dodge, and roll away from harm while doing your best to survive as long as possible. Land hits to build up combo multipliers then land a kill for increased favour! 

REQUIREMENTS

  • Java 7 
  • OpenGL 2.0+ compatible graphics driver 
  • 800x600 resolution (fixed screen size)
